solution.text:
As per the theorem if DE is parallel to BC
\(\Rightarrow \frac xy =\frac {x'}{y'}=\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow \frac {x'}{y'} = \frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}\Rightarrow x'=\frac {_{{2*k}}_\times _{j}_}{_{k}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow x'=_{{2*j}}_\)

content.text:
In the \(\bigtriangleup \) ABC, DE is parallel to BC.
find the value of x', if AD=x=_{j}_, BD=y=_{k}_, EC=y'=_{{2*k}}_.
